# Invease
> Free invoice generator for UK businesses

Invease is a client-side web application that generates professional UK invoices.
No account required. All data stays on the user's device.

## Features
- Invoice and credit note creation
- UK VAT calculations (0%, 5%, 20%, reverse charge)
- CIS (Construction Industry Scheme) support
- Companies House integration for company lookup
- PDF generation and download
- Payment tracking dashboard
- Customer autocomplete from history
- PWA with offline support

## Technical
- Built with Next.js, React 19, TypeScript
- No backend â€” all processing happens in the browser
- Data stored in localStorage/sessionStorage
- Bank details stored in memory only (never persisted)
